content:
its the beginning of the end PERIOD Finals week is near PERIOD

Though it feels as though it may be impossible to go on there are measures that can be taken that can ensure finals week can go as smoothly and successfully as it possibly can  provided that youve studied PERIOD

Here are some finals hacks that will help you slay your exams and guide you to the light at the end of the tunnel that is summer break PERIOD

And what could possibly be the most important tip of all  no matter how finals turn out dont let your grades or GPA define you PERIOD Sometimes test anxiety gets in the way of an A but so long as you made the effort and gave yourself the chance to succeed remember that you are enough PERIOD

Your donation will support the student journalists of Fresno State Your contribution will allow us to purchase equipment and cover our annual website hosting costs PERIOD
